promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic frilled-lizard steel-type pokemon wearing ancient gemstones. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemdrake, a a young basic frilled-lizard steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Metal Hook, Metal Jail. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "steel" or "Gemdrake". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Hiding in rocky terrains, Gemdrake masterfully manipulates its metallic scales to capture prey with Metal Hook, turning the terrain into a Metal Jail.
